Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Would it be easy to make a mod that shows whether the parachutes in your next stage can be deployed safely? (Now that Squad added the 'safe?' indicator to chutes)

If so, that would be a nice/cute mod to have. Similar to how Deadly Reentry does it, perhaps ?

Ah, it seems somebody went ahead and did it. Thank you.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129154-1-0-4-Chute-Safety-Indicator-v1-0-0-July-19-2015](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129154-1-0-4-Chute-Safety-Indicator-v1-0-0-July-19-2015)
